>
[Shimmering Dust](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1009)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This luminous mica dust fluoresces for a short time after being exposed to significant amounts of magical energy. When a creature fails its save against a cloud of [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136) created using this catalyst, glowing grains stick to them, causing them to shed dim light in a 20-foot radius for as long as their invisibility is negated by the spell as well as causing them to take a –2 circumstance penalty to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) for that duration.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
